committees.committee: Senate Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: An Act to amend the minimum limits of compensation of Senate committee employees and to amend the indicia requirements on franked mail, and for other purposes.

summary.text: (LATEST SUMMARY) Removes the minimum rates of compensation for Senate employees and authorizes the chairman of a Senate committee to appoint employees to the committee at whatever lower rate of compensation he determines appropriate. Eliminates the requirement that the words "Postage paid by Congress" be printed on envelopes, wrappers, cards, or labels used to transmit franked mail.

titles.title: A bill relating to the compensation of employees of Senate committees.
An Act to amend the minimum limits of compensation of Senate committee employees and to amend the indicia requirements on franked mail, and for other purposes.
